Title.0: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
Title.1: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train

Actors.0: Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka
Actors.1: Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

Plot.0: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.
Plot.1: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.
